languages.text: Эдельтрад погиб, нарушив ритуал Кунрада — и поплатился за свою отчаянную смелость жизнью. Избавьте создание, в которое превратился псайкер, от дальнейших страданий.

traits.locale_text: Эдельтрад погиб, нарушив ритуал Кунрада — и поплатился за свою отчаянную смелость жизнью. Избавьте создание, в которое превратился псайкер, от дальнейших страданий.

languages.text: Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.
languages.original_text: Эдельтрад погиб, нарушив ритуал Кунрада — и поплатился за свою отчаянную смелость жизнью. Избавьте создание, в которое превратился псайкер, от дальнейших страданий.

traits.locale_text: Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.
Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.
Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.

languages.text: Edelthrads unvorsichtige Tollkühnheit hat ihn das Leben gekostet: Er starb bei dem Versuch, Kunrads Ritual zu unterbrechen. Erlöse die Kreatur, in die der Psioniker sich verwandelt hat, von ihrer Qual.
languages.original_text: Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.

traits.locale_text: Edelthrads unvorsichtige Tollkühnheit hat ihn das Leben gekostet: Er starb bei dem Versuch, Kunrads Ritual zu unterbrechen. Erlöse die Kreatur, in die der Psioniker sich verwandelt hat, von ihrer Qual.

languages.text: Le courage et la témérité d'Edelthrad lui ont coûté la vie : il est mort en tentant d'interrompre le rituel de Kunrad. Mettez un terme aux souffrances de la créature en laquelle s'est changée la psyker.
languages.original_text: Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.

traits.locale_text: Le courage et la témérité d'Edelthrad lui ont coûté la vie : il est mort en tentant d'interrompre le rituel de Kunrad. Mettez un terme aux souffrances de la créature en laquelle s'est changée la psyker.

languages.text: 艾德萨德鲁莽的勇气让他付出了生命的代价，他在阻止昆拉德邪恶仪式的过程中牺牲了。消灭由这位灵能者变成的怪物，让他从痛苦中解脱出来吧。
languages.original_text: Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.

traits.locale_text: 艾德萨德鲁莽的勇气让他付出了生命的代价，他在阻止昆拉德邪恶仪式的过程中牺牲了。消灭由这位灵能者变成的怪物，让他从痛苦中解脱出来吧。

languages.text: エデルスラドの無謀な勇気が彼の命を奪った。彼はクンラッドの儀式を妨害しようとして死んだのだ。異能者が変身したその生物を倒して楽にしてやるのだ。
languages.original_text: Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.

traits.locale_text: エデルスラドの無謀な勇気が彼の命を奪った。彼はクンラッドの儀式を妨害しようとして死んだのだ。異能者が変身したその生物を倒して楽にしてやるのだ。

languages.text: El valor temerario de Edelthrad le ha costado la vida: ha muerto intentando interrumpir el ritual de Kunrad. Acaba con la criatura en la que el psíquico se ha transformado.
languages.original_text: Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.

traits.locale_text: El valor temerario de Edelthrad le ha costado la vida: ha muerto intentando interrumpir el ritual de Kunrad. Acaba con la criatura en la que el psíquico se ha transformado.

languages.text: Edelthrad'ın pervasız cesareti canına mal oldu. Adam, Kunrad'ın ayinini durdurmaya çalışırken son nefesini verdi. Ruhsezerin dönüştüğü yaratığı yere sererek yaşadığı ızdıraba son ver.
languages.original_text: Edelthrad's reckless bravery cost him his life: he died trying to disrupt Kunrad's ritual. Put the creature the psyker has turned into out of its misery.

traits.locale_text: Edelthrad'ın pervasız cesareti canına mal oldu. Adam, Kunrad'ın ayinini durdurmaya çalışırken son nefesini verdi. Ruhsezerin dönüştüğü yaratığı yere sererek yaşadığı ızdıraba son ver.
